sentences.english: Pottery-making schools spring up like bamboo shoots after a spring rain.
sentences.chinese: 春天像制陶学校竹笋一场春雨过后。

sentences.english: Sakura shrimp, green bamboo shoots, green peas, rice, seared red shrimp, white asparagus.
sentences.chinese: 樱花虾绿竹笋青都炊饭搭配煎红虾及白芦笋。

sentences.english: Now is the best time of the year to eat freshly harvested bamboo shoots.
sentences.chinese: 每一年这耶时阵是呷竹笋尚好耶时机。

sentences.english: The lush bamboo groves remember the first time she went digging bamboo shoots with her brother.
sentences.chinese: 那些翠绿的竹林记着查利云第一次跟哥哥去挖竹笋。

sentences.english: A sweet and pretty bamboo shoots girl , the bamboo is exactly knocked for itself.
sentences.chinese: 竹笋姑娘的娇美，恰恰是被“敲竹杠”的缘由。

sentences.english: Salim pulls out his gun and shoots Javed.
sentences.chinese: 萨利姆拿出他的枪和竹笋贾韦德。

sentences.english: Nan bamboo shoot, also called Mao bamboo shoot or Yulanpian(dried slices of tender bamboo shoots).
sentences.chinese: 楠笋又名毛竹笋，玉兰片。

sentences.english: The tender young shoots of bamboo are tasty. People like to eat them.
sentences.chinese: 鲜嫩的竹笋很可口，人们很爱吃。

sentences.english: Xi Wang started to eat bamboo shoots and leaves.
sentences.chinese: 六个月后，希望开始吃竹笋和竹叶。

sentences.english: Please do an offer to the bamboo shoots of the quality as these in the continue contract.
sentences.chinese: 请把上次合同中订的那种质量的竹笋向咱们报个价。

sentences.english: The first is made with pounded shrimp paste, chopped shrimps and shredded bamboo shoots.
sentences.chinese: 前者是用剁烂的虾酱，碎虾肉和碎竹笋制作。

sentences.english: The bamboo shoots are pushing through after the spring rain.
sentences.chinese: 春雨过后，竹笋都冒了出来。

definition: winter bamboo shoots (smaller and tenderer as a result of being dug out before they come out of the soil)
springtime bamboo shoots/fig. (of woman's fingers) tender and delicate
Manchurian wild rice 菰[gu1], aka water bamboo, or its edible stem, which resembles a bamboo shoot
radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
